special_abilities.name: Spellcasting.
descriptions: The flamewrath is a 7th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 14, +6 to hit with spell attacks). It knows the following sorcerer spells:

descriptions.raw: Cantrips (at will): control flames, fire bolt, friends, light, minor illusion
descriptions.hyperlinked: Cantrips (at will): control flames, fire bolt, friends, light, minor illusion

descriptions.raw: 1st level (4 slots): burning hands, color spray, mage armor
descriptions.hyperlinked: 1st level (4 slots): burning hands, color spray, mage armor

descriptions.raw: 4th level (1 slot): fire shield (see Wreathed in Flame)
descriptions.hyperlinked: 4th level (1 slot): fire shield (see Wreathed in Flame)

special_abilities.name: Wreathed in Flame.
descriptions: For the flamewrath, the warm version of the fire shield spell has a duration of "until dispelled." The fire shield burns for 10 minutes after the flamewrath dies, consuming its body.

actions.name: Dagger.
descriptions: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.
